professional_summary: Database administrator with expertise in Oracle RAC, high availability, disaster recovery, and performance tuning.

key_responsibilities: Designed and implemented high-availability Oracle RAC environments.
Administered large-scale database systems for mission-critical applications.
Performed regular performance tuning and optimization of production databases.
Deployed Oracle RAC solutions to enhance database availability.
Managed disaster recovery and backup processes for critical databases.
Implemented Golden Gate replication for real-time data replication.

technical_skills:
Oracle Database Administration",
            "RAC (Real Application Clustering)",
            "High Availability and Disaster Recovery",
            "Database Performance Tuning",
